name: World of Happiness
description:
The world many people live in.... and The World of Happiness

                  Find the cakes and give them to people... 

                  A cake is a gate to THE WORLD OF HAPPINESS

                  Lead all the people to this world!

                  Keys:

                                    arrow keys : move

                                    spacebar : give cake

                                    escape : restart 

All resources are made during the game jam 

Jame Gam #20

if you like the music, you can use it...
